I am an Amsterdam based multidisciplinary creative.Although I am a graphic designer and Illustrator by profession,anything and everything involving design and color makes me skip a beat.

2017 - Current

Freelance

Illustrator and Graphic designer

As a freelancer I have done Photography,copywriting and grapicdesign for collaterals like logos, posters and pamphlets for various clients and has overseen printing and publishing of the same.

2009 - 2009

Dr. G.R.Damodaran College of Science

Lecturer -Photography and design Lab

Mentored courses on Design theory and Digital photography. The main goals were to help students understand and use theory and conceptual practices as parallel to technical Photography and also guide them to create visual materials for their final portfolio.
